A32NX_BRAKE_TEMPERATURE_1.description: represents the brake temperature of the rear wheels

A32NX_BRAKE_TEMPERATURE_2.description: represents the brake temperature of the rear wheels

A32NX_BRAKE_TEMPERATURE_3.description: represents the brake temperature of the rear wheels

A32NX_BRAKE_TEMPERATURE_4.description: represents the brake temperature of the rear wheels

A32NX_REPORTED_BRAKE_TEMPERATURE_1.description: represents the reported brake temperature of the main wheels reported by the BSCU. It can be different from the brake temperature when the brake fan has been used, because the brake fan will cool the sensor more than the brakes (which have much more energy to dissipate) therefore giving potentially erroneous readings that the pilots must take into account

A32NX_REPORTED_BRAKE_TEMPERATURE_2.description: represents the reported brake temperature of the main wheels reported by the BSCU. It can be different from the brake temperature when the brake fan has been used, because the brake fan will cool the sensor more than the brakes (which have much more energy to dissipate) therefore giving potentially erroneous readings that the pilots must take into account

A32NX_REPORTED_BRAKE_TEMPERATURE_3.description: represents the reported brake temperature of the main wheels reported by the BSCU. It can be different from the brake temperature when the brake fan has been used, because the brake fan will cool the sensor more than the brakes (which have much more energy to dissipate) therefore giving potentially erroneous readings that the pilots must take into account

A32NX_REPORTED_BRAKE_TEMPERATURE_4.description: represents the reported brake temperature of the main wheels reported by the BSCU. It can be different from the brake temperature when the brake fan has been used, because the brake fan will cool the sensor more than the brakes (which have much more energy to dissipate) therefore giving potentially erroneous readings that the pilots must take into account

A32NX_BRAKE_FAN_RUNNING.description: whether or not the brake fan is running (brake fan button pressed AND left main landing gear down and locked, reported by BSCU)

A32NX_BRAKE_FAN_side_RUNNING.description: wether or not a brake fan on the corresponding side is running {side} LEFT RIGHT

A32NX_BRAKE_FAN_BTN_PRESSED.description: whether or not the brake fan button is pressed

A32NX_BRAKES_HOT.description: whether one of the brakes are hot (>300Â°C)

A32NX_OANS_WORD_1.type: Data word for OANS functions. Used for displaying alerts on the PFD.
A32NX_OANS_WORD_1.description: Arinc429<Discrete> | Bit |            Description            | |:---:|:---------------------------------:| | 11  | OANS: Runway ahead                |   ## Electronic Flight Bag (ATA 46)

A32NX_EFIS_side_NAVAID_1|2_MODE.description: Provides the selected NAVAIDs for display on the EFIS Value | Meaning --| --0 | Off 1 | ADF 2 | VOR {side} L R

A32NX_EFIS_side_ND_MODE.description: Provides the selected navigation display mode for the EFIS Value | Meaning --| --0 | ROSE ILS 1 | ROSE VOR 2 | ROSE NAV 3 | ARC 4 | PLAN {side} L R

A32NX_EFIS_side_ND_RANGE.description: Provides the selected navigation display range for the EFIS Value | Meaning --| --0 | 10 1 | 20 2 | 40 3 | 80 4 | 160 5 | 320 {side} L R

A32NX_EFIS_side_OPTION.description: Provides a bitmask of the selected EFIS option/overlays Value | Meaning --| --0 | None 1 | Constraints 2 | VOR/DMEs 4 | Waypoints 8 | NDBs 16 | Airports {side} L R

A32NX_TRK_FPA_MODE_ACTIVE.description: True if TRK/FPA mode is active

A32NX_AUTOPILOT_HEADING_SELECTED.description: Indicates the selected heading on the FCU, instantly updated In case of managed heading mode, the value is -1

A32NX_FCU_ALT_MANAGED.description: Indicates if managed altitude mode is active (dot) State | Value --| --SELECTED | 0 MANAGED | 1

A32NX_FCU_VS_MANAGED.description: Indicates if managed VS/FPA mode is active State | Value --| --SELECTED | 0 MANAGED | 1

A32NX_AUTOPILOT_NOSEWHEEL_DEMAND.description: Steering demand from autopilot to BSCU [-1;1] -1 left, 0 middle

A32NX_FMA_LATERAL_MODE.description: Indicates **engaged** lateral mode of the Flight Director / Autopilot Mode | Value --| --NONE | 0 HDG | 10 TRACK | 11 NAV | 20 LOC_CPT | 30 LOC_TRACK | 31 LAND | 32 FLARE | 33 ROLL_OUT | 34 RWY | 40 RWY_TRACK | 41 GA_TRACK | 50

A32NX_FMA_LATERAL_ARMED.description: Indicates **armed** lateral mode of the Flight Director / Autopilot Mode | Bit --| --NAV | 0 LOC | 1

A32NX_FMA_VERTICAL_MODE.description: Indicates **engaged** vertical mode of the Flight Director / Autopilot Mode | Value --| --NONE | 0 ALT | 10 ALT_CPT | 11 OP_CLB | 12 OP_DES | 13 VS | 14 FPA | 15 ALT_CST | 20 ALT_CST_CPT | 21 CLB | 22 DES | 23 FINAL | 24 GS_CPT | 30 GS_TRACK | 31 LAND | 32 FLARE | 33 ROLL_OUT | 34 SRS | 40 SRS_GA | 41 TCAS | 50

A32NX_FMA_VERTICAL_ARMED.description: Indicates **armed** vertical mode of the Flight Director / Autopilot Mode | Bit --| --ALT | 0 ALT_CST | 1 CLB | 2 DES | 3 GS | 4 FINAL | 5 TCAS | 6

A32NX_FMA_EXPEDITE_MODE.description: Indicates if expedite mode is engaged State | Value --| --OFF | 0 ON | 1

A32NX_AUTOPILOT_AUTOLAND_WARNING.description: Indicates if Autoland warning light is illuminated Possible values: State | Value --| --OFF | 0 ON | 1

A32NX_AUTOPILOT_ACTIVE.description: Indicates if any Autopilot is engaged Possible values: State | Value --| --DISENGAGED | 0 ENGAGED | 1

A32NX_AUTOPILOT_H_DOT_RADIO.description: Indicates the current estimated vertical speed relative to the runway Important: the signal is only usable above the runway and is not to be used elsewhere

A32NX_AUTOTHRUST_STATUS.description: Indicates the current status of the ATHR system Mode | Value --| --DISENGAGED | 0 ENGAGED_ARMED | 1 ENGAGED_ACTIVE | 2

A32NX_AUTOTHRUST_MODE.description: Indicates the current thrust mode of the ATHR system Mode | Value --| --NONE | 0 A_FLOOR | 13

A32NX_AUTOPILOT_SPEED_SELECTED.description: MACH mode: 0.10 to 0.99 (M) Indicates the selected speed on the FCU, instantly updated In case of managed speed mode, the value is -1

A32NX_AUTOPILOT_FPA_SELECTED.description: Indicates the selected FPA on the FCU, instantly updated

A32NX_AUTOPILOT_VS_SELECTED.description: Indicates the selected V/S on the FCU, instantly updated

A32NX_FCU_SPD_MANAGED_DASHES.description: Indicates if managed speed/mach mode is active and a numerical value is not displayed State | Value --| --SELECTED | 0 MANAGED | 1

A32NX_FCU_SPD_MANAGED_DOT.description: Indicates if managed speed/mach mode is active State | Value --| --SELECTED | 0 MANAGED | 1

A32NX_FCU_HDG_MANAGED_DASHES.description: Indicates if managed heading mode is active and a numerical value is not displayed State | Value --| --SELECTED | 0 MANAGED | 1

A32NX_FCU_HDG_MANAGED_DOT.description: Indicates if managed heading mode is active or armed State | Value --| --SELECTED | 0 MANAGED/ARMED | 1

A32NX_AUTOTHRUST_MODE_MESSAGE.description: Indicates ATHR related message to be displayed on the PFD Mode | Value --| --NONE | 0 LVR_CLB | 3
